languages.text: {n}Идира съеживается и отчаянно глотает ртом воздух, будто ее ударили под дых.{/n} "Темнота лезет в глотку, в ноздри, буравится под кожу... Она заползает в легкие и наполняет их безнадежностью, застилает глаза и уши. Есть только она, снаружи и во мне". {n}Женщина резко выпрямляется и вскрикивает, озадаченно оглядываясь по сторонам.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан... это странно, но все шепотки будто разом умолкли. Ума не приложу, что это значит, но предчувствие у меня паскудное".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира съеживается и отчаянно глотает ртом воздух, будто ее ударили под дых.{/n} "Темнота лезет в глотку, в ноздри, буравится под кожу... Она заползает в легкие и наполняет их безнадежностью, застилает глаза и уши. Есть только она, снаружи и во мне". {n}Женщина резко выпрямляется и вскрикивает, озадаченно оглядываясь по сторонам.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан... это странно, но все шепотки будто разом умолкли. Ума не приложу, что это значит, но предчувствие у меня паскудное".

languages.text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉退了一步。她张开嘴，拼命地吸着气，仿佛有人刚刚一拳打在了她的肚子上。{/n}“黑暗悄悄地涌入我的喉咙，我的鼻孔。它在我的皮肤下蠕动，钻进了我的肺里，堵住了我的眼睛和耳朵，填满了绝望。我的周围，我的体内只剩下黑暗。”{n}她突然停止了身子，大哭起来，困惑地看着周围。{/n}“请原谅我，舰长大人……这很古怪，但那些低语突然之间就沉默了下来。我不知道这意味着什么。我的直觉告诉我，这会是件可怕的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

languages.text: {n}Idira se encoge y coge aire desesperada con la boca abierta, como si acabaran de sacárselo de los pulmones.{/n} «La oscuridad se filtra por mi garganta, mi nariz, se retuerce bajo mi piel... Entra en mis pulmones y los llena de desesperación, apagando mis ojos y mis oídos. Solo está la oscuridad, a mi alrededor y en mi interior». {n}De repente, se incorpora y grita mientras mira alrededor, totalmente confusa.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán... Es muy raro, pero todos los susurros se han callado a la vez. No tengo ni idea de lo que significa eso. Mi intuición me dice que es algo terrible».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... Entra en mis pulmones y los llena de desesperación, apagando mis ojos y mis oídos. Solo está la oscuridad, a mi alrededor y en mi interior». {n}De repente, se incorpora y grita mientras mira alrededor, totalmente confusa.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán... Es muy raro, pero todos los susurros se han callado a la vez. No tengo ni idea de lo que significa eso, pero mi intuición me dice que es algo terrible».

languages.text: {n}イディラはたじろぎ、まるで誰かに腹を殴られたかのように、必死に空気を飲み込む。{/n}「闇があたいの喉や鼻孔に忍び込み、皮膚の下で蠢いているの…肺に入り込み、絶望で満たされ、目も耳も塞がれる。あたいの周りには、あたいの中には、それしかないの」{n}彼女は突然、背筋を伸ばし、叫び声を上げ、混乱した様子で辺りを見回した。{/n}「ごめんなさい、ロード・キャプテン…奇妙なことに、ささやき声が一気に静まり返ったの。それが何を意味するのか、あたいには見当もつかないわ。でも、直感が何か悲惨なことだって告げているの」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

{n}イディラはたじろぎ、まるで誰かに腹を殴られたかのように、必死に空気を飲み込む。{/n}「闇が私の喉や鼻孔に忍び込み、皮膚の下で蠢いている…肺に入り込み、絶望で満たされ、目も耳も塞がれる。私の周りには、私の中には、それしかないの。」{n}彼女は突然、背筋を伸ばし、叫び声を上げ、混乱した様子で辺りを見回した。{/n}「ごめんなさい、ロード・キャプテン…奇妙なことに、ささやき声が一気に静まり返ったの。それが何を意味するのか、私には見当もつかないわ。でも、直感が何か悲惨なことだと告げているの」

languages.text: {n}Idira zuckt zusammen. Ihr Mund ringt verzweifelt nach Luft, als hätte ihr jemand einen Schlag in die Magengrube versetzt.{/n} "Die Dunkelheit kriecht in meinen Rachen, in meine Nase, sie windet sich unter meiner Haut ... Sie schleicht in meine Lungen und füllt sie mit Verzweiflung, sie blockiert meine Augen und meine Ohren. Es gibt nur noch Dunkelheit, um mich herum und in mir." {n}Plötzlich richtet sie sich auf, schreit auf und blickt sich verwirrt um.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Lord Captain ... Es ist merkwürdig, doch das Flüstern ist soeben urplötzlich verstummt. Ich weiß nicht, was das bedeutet. Meine Intuition sagt mir ... es ist schrecklich."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

languages.text: {n}Idira tressaille, le souffle coupé, comme si quelqu'un venait de la frapper au ventre.{/n} « Des ténèbres s'insinuent dans ma gorge, dans mon nez ; elles s'agitent sous ma peau... Elles emplissent mes poumons de désespoir et obstruent mes yeux et mes oreilles. Elles sont partout, autour de moi et en moi. » {n}Soudain, elle se redresse en hurlant et jette des regards confus autour d'elle.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... C'est étrange, mais toutes les voix se sont tues d'un coup. Je ne sais pas ce que ça veut dire, mais à mon avis, ça ne présage rien de bon. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

Elles emplissent mes poumons de désespoir et obstruent mes yeux et mes oreilles. Elles sont partout, autour de moi et en moi. » {n}Soudain, elle se redresse en hurlant et jette des regards confus autour d'elle.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... C'est étrange, mais toutes les voix se sont tues d'un coup. Je ne sais pas ce que ça veut dire, mais à mon avis, ça ne présage rien de bon. »

languages.text: {n}İdira irkiliyor. Birisi karnına güçlü bir yumruk atmış gibi can havliyle nefes almaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Karanlık boğazımdan, burnumdan süzülüyor. Derimin altında kıpırdanıp duruyor. Ciğerlerime geçtiğindeyse hava yerine keder dolduruyor. Gözlerimi kör, kulaklarımı sağır ediyor. Sadece karanlık var. Onu hem çevremde hem de içimde hissediyorum." {n}Aniden toparlanıyor. Kafası karışmış hâlde etrafa bakınırken haykırıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, affet beni... Çok tuhaf ama tüm sesler bir anda sükûnete büründü. Bunun ne anlama geldiğini bilmiyorum. Sezgilerim bana vahim bir şey olduğunu söylüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira flinches, her mouth desperately gulping down air as if someone just punched her in the gut.{/n} "Darkness creeps into my throat, my nostrils, it wriggles under my skin... It slips into my lungs and fills them with despair, blocking up my eyes and ears. There is only it, around me and inside me." {n}She suddenly straightens and cries out, looking around in confusion.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain... It's strange, but the whispers just fell silent all at once. I have no clue what it means. My intuition tells me it's something dire."

Çok tuhaf ama tüm sesler bir anda sükûnete büründü. Bunun ne anlama geldiğini bilmiyorum. Sezgilerim bana vahim bir şey olduğunu söylüyor."
